item.title: Digital Twin-Enabled Adaptive Fleet Management
item.description:
Related Publications

  • A Novel Adaptive AMR Fleet Management System Leveraging AI-enabled Digital Twin for Agile Incident Response and Improved Shop-floor Efficiency — Louie, Osman M. Tokhi, Bugra

item.title: Vision-Enabled SAR for Manual Assembly
item.description:
Related Publications

  • Spatial Augmented Reality in Manual Assembly: An Empirical Investigation of Its Effects on Assembly Performance and Cognitive Ergonomics — Bugra, Naimul, Louie, Malarvizhi Kaniappan Chinnathai
  • Gest-SAR: A Gesture-Controlled Spatial AR System for Interactive Manual Assembly Guidance with Real-Time Operational Feedback — Naimul, Bugra
